templates.name: Supplier quote needed
templates.description: Please provide a quote for the component/change described. Include pricing, lead time, and MOQ.

templates.name: Quality inspection data required
templates.description: Please provide inspection data, defect rates, or quality metrics for the relevant parts.

templates.name: CAD model review needed
templates.description: Please review the CAD model and provide feedback on design feasibility and manufacturability.

templates.name: Product specifications clarification
templates.description: Please clarify the product specifications and requirements for this change.

templates.name: Testing requirements clarification
templates.description: Please specify the testing requirements, test methods, and acceptance criteria.

templates.name: BOM verification needed
templates.description: Please verify the Bill of Materials accuracy and identify any discrepancies.

templates.name: Cost breakdown required
templates.description: Please provide a detailed cost breakdown including materials, labor, and tooling.

templates.name: Timeline/lead time information
templates.description: Please provide timeline and lead time information for completing this work.

templates.name: Supplier capability assessment
templates.description: Please assess the supplier's capability to meet the specified requirements.

templates.name: Drawing review needed
templates.description: Please review the engineering drawings and provide feedback or corrections.
